attributes.action: giving assistance dogs the same legal rights as police dogs with regards to dog attack
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an assistant dog user my dogs have been attacked and savaged on several occassions.  The last attack my assistance dog had to be retired due to the trauma that had been caused.  

Criminal injouries did not recognise that I had suffered permanent trauma in the form of flash backs and loss of confidence not to mention my freedom.  
The law clearly needs to be changed so that more assist dog users are protected and dangerous dogs kept under controle.  
bring back the dog licence or make chipping a legal requirment.
